phrases.phrase: Ads Manager: Disable low CTR ads
Ads Manager: Rebuild widgets data cache
Display advertiser section menu in user account menu
Exclude user groups from AdBlock detection
Enable affiliate link ads in thread custom fields
Archive ads inactive for more than
Delete click fraud monitor entries older than
Enable click fraud monitor global blocking
Prevent ads showing in these templates
Move expired promo threads to selected forum
Enable keyword ads in thread custom fields
Maximum sticky promo threads per forum
Maximum user promo threads per forum
Display advertiser section link in user menu
Keyword and affiliate link ads user group post exceptions
If enabled, this option allows you to display the advertiser section menu in the user account section menu.
If enabled, links for edit, delete, statistics, etc, will be displayed under the ad.

Choose what to do when your custom HTML/JavaScript ads are blocked by AdBlock. The last three options use the following phrases: siropu_ads_manager_support_us_message and siropu_ads_manager_support_us_title
This option allows you to enable AdBlock detection based on user's device.
This option allows you to display the notice after x page views.
This option allows you to display the notice every x minutes.
This option allows you exclude certain pages from AdBlock detection by specifying the page content template.
Allows you to exclude certain user groups from AdBlock detection.
This option allows you to display a custom message to users who have AdBlock enabled. You may use HTML.
If an URL is provided, the user will get redirected to this URL when AdBlock is detected. This option only works with "Force user to disable AdBlock".
A list of custom ad sizes that you can use when creating packages.
This option allows you to parse keyword and affiliate link ads when you post.
Admins will receive alert notifications when advertisers create ads.
Admins will receive email notifications when advertisers create ads.
This controls the maximum number of ads that will be shown in ad list.
If you are using ads.txt file, you can edit it from here.
This option allows you to add advertisers to custom user groups.
If enabled, a list with all the active code, banner, text and link ads of the current advertisers will be displayed on a custom page.
If enabled, this option allows you to display a list of your current advertisers.
This option allows you to enable affiliate link ads in thread custom fields.
Select which extensions you want to allow for banner ads.
Select which categories you allow for featured resources.
Select which forums you allow for sticky threads.
This option allows you to archive ads that haven't been active in the last x days. Archived ads will have the status "Archived" and won't be visible in the ACP by default.

Some Ad Blockers may block the siropu/am/user path to the data directory on your server, preventing banners from displaying. To fix that problem, you can use this option to change the path from siropu/am/user to something unique (avoid ad related names such as "banners", "ads", etc).

Once you have provided a unique name and hit the save button, the directory will be created automatically and current banners copied from the old directory to the new directory.
The body selector specific to your style. You might need to change this if you are using a custom style with different selectors than the default style.
This option allows you to set a time frame between click counts for the same ad by the same visitor.
This option allows you to automatically delete click fraud monitor entries that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to hide from blocked IPs all the ads that use click fraud monitor.
This option allows you to automatically delete ad click statistics that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to automatically delete ad daily statistics that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to automatically disable ads with a low CTR (Click-Through Rate) after x days. This option only affects ads created from the admin control panel.
If you don't want advertisers to use certain keywords when creating keyword ads, place them here each on a new row.
You may want to prevent all ads from showing within certain templates, such as errors or other pages that may be against your ad provider's ToS. List them above.
If enabled, this will display the expiration date in ad list
If enabled, this will display the username of the ad owner in ad list.
If enabled, advertisers will be able to set custom fields for their thread, based on the selected forum.
If enabled, advertisers will be able to set a prefix for their thread, based on the selected forum.
If a forum is set, expired promo threads will be moved to that forum.

This option allows you to set a prefix for featured resources. You can use a global prefix because Ads Manager will reserve it only for featured resources and non-advertisers will not be able to use it.
If enabled, this option allows you to display a list of your current featured resources.
If enabled, this option allows you to display a list of your current sticky and promo threads.
The footer selector specific to your style. You might need to change this if you are using a custom style with different selectors than the default style.
The maximum number of stickies that can be purchased per forum.
Display a welcome message to advertisers on the Ads Manager advertiser home page.
The inner body selector specific to your style. You might need to change this if you are using a custom style with different selectors than the default style.
The maximum time allowed to pay a pending invoice.

Some Ad Blockers may block the siropu/am/core.min.js file found in the js directory on your server, preventing some features such as statistics from working. To fix that problem, you can use this option to change the directory path from siropu/am/core.min.js to something unique (avoid ad related names such as "banners", "ads", etc).

If you are not using an external path (CDN), the format should be: directoryName/fileName.js

Once you have provided a unique path and hit the save button, the directory will be created automatically and current JS file copied from the old directory to the new directory.
If a length is set, advertisers can add a description that will be displayed as a tooltip when hovering over the keywords. Set to 0 to disable descriptions.
The maximum number of words allowed in keyword phrase.
This option allows you to enable keyword ads in thread custom fields.
The maximum description length for text ads.
The maximum title length allowed for link and text ads.
The maximum size in kilobytes allowed for background images.
The maximum size in kilobytes allowed for banner images.
The maximum number of stickies that can be purchased per forum.
The maximum number of promo threads a user can purchase per forum.
If enabled, the link to the advertiser section will be displayed in the user drop down menu, instead of the main navigation.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain nodes, by adding each ID separated by comma.
If enabled, this will display the controller class, controller action, view class and the content template name of any page (to use in page criteria).
This allows you to provide advertisers with custom payment instructions when using alternative payment options.
Select which payment profiles you want to use.
The background color of the banner placeholder for the "Advertise Here" package option.
The text color of the banner placeholder for the "Advertise Here" package option.
If enabled, you can view where each position is displayed. This doesn't include dynamic positions and some predefined positions.
Set your preferred currency for when creating packages and invoices.
Select the forums for promo threads.
This option allows you to set a default prefix for promo threads.
The CSS class for banner ad units.
The CSS class for code ad units.
The CSS class for individual ads.
The CSS class for link ad units.
The CSS class for text ad units.
This option allows you to set a prefix for sticky threads. You can use a global prefix because Ads Manager will reserve it only for sticky threads and non-advertisers will not be able to use it.
If enabled, advertisers can opt in for recurring payments.

(Optional) This option allows you to add special terms and conditions for advertisers. If provided, it will display a checkbox and a link with an overlay with the terms and conditions, on the ad creation page.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain threads, by adding each ID separated by comma.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain threads based on the prefix.
Keyword and affiliate link ads will not apply to posts made by users in the selected user groups.
The maximum number of stickies a user can purchase per forum.
This option allows you to set a time frame between view counts for the same ad by the same visitor.
Select the method that will be used to count views.
General options for Ads Manager by Siropu.
Admin options for Ads Manager by Siropu.
Advertiser options for Ads Manager by Siropu.
Edit own ads without admin approval
This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from http://www.maxmind.com.
This action cannot be taken for the following PAID featured resources: {items}
This action cannot be taken for the following PAID sticky threads: {items}
Action not allowed for paid featured resources.
Action not allowed for paid sticky threads.
This option allows you to activate the promo code at a set date. Promo code must be enabled.
Your ad has been added to the queue.
Approving the ad will automatically generate a new invoice for the advertiser if there are slots available, else the ad will be added to the queue.
If you want to enable this ad manually, go to Invoices and change the status of the invoice for this ad to "Completed".

If you want to generate the ad code using a PHP callback, you can do so by specifying the callback with arguments (optional) in the following format:

callback=\Path\To\MyCallbackClass::MyCallbackMethod
arguments={"arg1":"val1","arg2":"val2"}

Callback signature:

\Siropu\AdsManager\Entity\Ad $ad, array $params

Your callback must return a valid HTML code.
Paste your ad code here (AdSense, affiliate banners, etc).
Please note that ads are reviewed by administrators and require their approval. Once approved, an invoice will be generated for you to pay.
Please note that ads are reviewed by administrators and require their approval. Once approved, the ad will become active if there are ad spaces available, else the ad will be queued.
Please provide the ad details based on the package specifications.
The maximum number of ads to display at the same time.
Set the order of this ad in relation to the other ads in the same position.

This option allows you to export the ad data as an XML file.
Please note that daily and click statistics are not included in the export.
The keyword you want to target.
To target multiple keywords, place each keyword on a new line.
Please note that limit only affects the ads created from the admin control panel.
A package allows you to manage and rotate multiple ads.
This ad requires your approval. Please click here to see ad details and approve or reject the ad.
Set the width and height for this ad.
The title of the link that can be clicked on.
(Optional) If a title is provided, it will be displayed when hovering over the keyword.
Ad "{name}" has been deleted by the author.
Ad {name} requires reapproval due to recent changes.
Force user to disable AdBlock (Not recommended)
This option allows you to add advertisers to custom user groups.
Instructions on how to use this position will be provided after the position is saved.
Add new owner to advertiser user groups
If enabled, ads created in this package won't require admin approval.
We are sorry, you cannot have more than {limit} active ad(s) in this package.
This option allows you to set a limit on how many active ads an advertiser can have.
Use this ad type if you want to transform links into affiliate links in thread posts, conversation messages and profile posts.
Use this package if you want to manage your own affiliate link ads. Cannot be used to sell this type of ads.

Specify the affiliate website you want to target. Only domain name is required as it will match any pages of that website. If you want to match the subdomains as well, add a . right before the domain name (Example: .google.com).
You will receive alert notifications in your user account about your ad status.
Set display alignment for this ad.
This option allows you to set which ad sizes are allowed for banner images. To allow any size, leave as is.

The alt attribute provides alternative information for an image if a user for some reason cannot view it (because of slow connection, an error in the src attribute, or if the user uses a screen reader).
Article Management System is not installed.
This option allows you to change the link anchor text of affiliate links.
This method allows you to build the affiliate link by appending the affiliate website to a custom affiliate URL.

This method allows you to build the affiliate link by appending your affiliate ID to the affiliate website.

Example of parameter:

affid=1234
This option allows you to enable the promo code only for certain packages.
Are you sure you want to delete all the ads?
Are you sure you want to reset all the statistics for this ad?
Are you sure you want to reset these statistics?
Use this ad type if you want to display background ads.
Use this package if you want to manage your own background ads or if you want to sell background ads.

This option allows you to display a backup ad if your HTML/JavaScript ad gets blocked by AdBlock or if AdSense has an unfilled ad status. Use a simple HTML banner code that doesn't contain any ad related information in its image URL (ad, advertisement, 468x60, 728x90, etc). To use this with AdBlock detection, you need to set the Ads Manager admin option "If AdBlock is detected" to "Replace ad with its backup".
Please provide this in the bank transfer payment description to identify the payment.
Use this ad type if you want to display image banner ads uploaded from your device or from image hosting services.
If multiple files are provided, they will rotate randomly on each page load.
Use this package if you want to manage your own banner ads or if you want to sell banner ads.
If multiple URLs are provided, they will rotate randomly on each page load.
You cannot submit an empty popup.
Check this option if you want keywords to be case sensitive.
You can choose a value between {min} and {max}.
Here you can monitor click fraud for the ads that have the option enabled.
If a click limit is set, the ad will become inactive once the limit is reached.
Click statistics have not been enabled for this ad.
This option allows you to create a new ad with the same data as "{name}" ad.
This option allows you to create a new package with the same settings and criteria as "{name}" package.
Use this ad type if you want to display ads such as AdSense, affiliate banners, etc.
Use this package if you want to manage your own code ads such as AdSense, affiliate banners, etc. It is not recommended to sell this ad type.
Any positions belonging to this category will be uncategorized following the deletion.
The name of the template specified in the controller response. Multiple templates may be separated by commas.
Below you can find a list with most of the content templates that you can use with page criteria options "Content template is" and "Content template is NOT".
The cost is per keyword phrase.
Exclude from package empty slot count
This option allows you to exclude this ad from the package empty slot count.
This option allows you to distribute impressions over a period of time.
Use a package if you want to manage and/or rotate multiple ads of the same type or if you want to make money by selling ad spaces.

When using a package, set your settings and criteria in the package and assign the package for each ad when creating ads from admin control panel. Doing so, you won't have to set the settings and criteria for each ad individually because it will automatically inherit the package's settings and criteria.
Create your own promo thread here for {costAmount} per {costPer}
This option allows you to set a custom CSS class.
Use this ad type if you want to keep track of custom service ads.
This option allows you to set different costs based on the category in which the resource will be featured.

If any of the values below are changed, you have to go to the template called siropu_ads_manager_ad.less and hit the save button without changing anything in the template. This will update the values you have set here in the CSS.
This option allows you to set custom costs based on the forum.
This option allows you to build your own banner code using HTML/JavaScript.
This option allows you to set different costs based on the keyword.
Use this package if you want to manage custom service ads.
This option allows you to use your own custom JavaScript popup. Paste the code here without the <script> tag.
Daily statistics have not been enabled for this ad.
Device criteria: Target your ad based on user device type, platform and browser.
Please confirm that you want to disable the placeholder.
This option allows you to set discounts based on the purchase length.
If set, the ads will be displayed with a delay of x seconds.
If set, the ad will be displayed with a delay of x seconds.
If set, a user will be able to view the ad every x minutes.
Choose how to display the ads.
This option allows you to display the ad in the advertiser list.
Display outside of selected nodes (non-node pages)

Set the priority of this ad in relation to the other ads in the same position. The higher the priority, the higher the chance of being displayed first. This option only works with packages and random ordering.
Do NOT display within selected nodes only (rather than including child nodes)
Do you have a promo code?
To disable email notifications for this ad, please click here.
You will receive email notifications in your inbox about your ad status.
Place the code above in your non XenForo page where you want the ad(s) to display.

Place this code before the closing </body> tag on the site where the embed code will be used. This code requires jQuery in order to function. If your site doesn't uses jQuey, place the following code before the above code: <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.5.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
Use this code instead if you are using external ads and experiencing slow page load.
If enabled, this option will add an "Advertise here" link under the ad unit if there are ad slots available, to attract more advertisers.
This option allows you to rotate multiple ads in a carousel.

This option is intended to be used with third-party ads such as AdSense. You can enable click fraud protection if you want to prevent click abuse, by hidding the ad after it has been clicked x times by the same visitor.
This option allows you to load the ad image after the page loads, when the ad container is in the view.
This option allows you to load the ad content after the page loads, when the ad container is in the view. The second option allows you to refresh the ad every x seconds after it has been loaded.
This option allows you to display a "Mark as paid" button that will notify you via an alert that the user has completed the payment.
If enabled, this will add navigation arrows before and after the carousel to manually scroll through ads.
If enabled, this will add navigation bullets beneath the carousel to manually scroll through ads.
If a user group is selected, the package will be available only for that group. Else, it will be available for all user groups.
Please confirm that you want to enable the placeholder.
If enabled, this option will add an "Advertise here" placeholder when there are no ads, to attract advertisers.
This option allows you to exclude certain URLs from getting converted to affiliate links.
If a value is set, this will allow advertisers to opt in for exclusive keyword use. Advertisers that opt in for this option will have the right to use those keywords exclusively.
This option allows you to use keywords exclusively.
The following keywords are exclusive and cannot be used at the moment: {keywords}
Set an expiration date for this promo code. If left blank, the promo code will never expire.
This option allows you to extend your ad to continue advertising.
We are sorry, currently there are no empty slots available. However, you can still extend your ad and once the invoice is paid, it will be added to the queue until a slot becomes available.
Use this ad type if you want to make a resource featured in XenForo Resource Manager.
Use this package if you want to sell featured resources in XenForo Resource Manager.
We are sorry, currently there are no empty slots available in this forum.
We are sorry, we have reached the maximum number of sticky threads allowed per forum ({limit}).
We are sorry, you have reached the maximum number of promo threads allowed per user ({limit}).
Geo criteria: Target your ad based on the user country.

To use Geo criteria, you need to download the Geo Lite 2 City database and upload the file GeoLite2-City.mmdb to src/addons/Siropu/AdsManager/Vendor/MaxMind. Please note that this feature can be resource intensive depending on how busy your board is.

Google Analytics allows you to track ad views and clicks, providing detailed information about the visitors who interact with the ads. Statistics for ads can be found in your Google Analytics account under Behavior > Events. In order to make use of this feature, please make sure that you have set your web property ID.
If set, the ads will be hidden after x seconds of display.
This option allows you to use the original link URL but open the affiliate URL when the link is clicked.
If set, the ad will be hidden after x seconds of display.
I agree with the Terms and Conditions
Choose what do if items with the same ID exista in the database.
Insert data from the import as separate items
Update existing items with the data from the import
Incompatible user criteria. A user cannot be a guest and have other statuses at the same time.
This option allows you to inherit the package's settings and criteria for a quick setup.

This option allows you to style the ad using CSS.

Example:

font-weight: bold; color: brown; font-style: italic;
Changing the invoice status to "Completed" will activate the ad and deactivate it if set to "Cancelled".
Invoice #{id} has been marked as paid.
Invoice with ID {invoiceId} has been marked as paid by {user} via bank transfer.
This option allows you to display the ad only if the current page is the last page in a thread or a conversation.

This option can only be used with dynamic positions. Depending on the position used, ID can be a page result item number relative to the total results on the page, a node ID, a thread ID, or a flag: R, L, U, Xnumber.

Flags:

  • R - Random
  • L - Last
  • U - First unread thread post or conversation message
  • Xnumber - Every x items (x3, x5, etc)

You can combine the U flag with other flags and numbers. The U flag will have priority over the others.
You can use multiple IDs separated by comma.
Use this ad type if you want to transform keywords into ad links in thread posts, conversation messages and profile posts.
Use this package if you want to sell keyword ads in thread posts, conversation messages and profile posts.
The maximum number of keywords in a page that can be turned into ads. Set to 0 for unlimited.
The maximum number of keywords in a post that can be turned into ads. Set to 0 for unlimited.
The following keywords are not allowed: {keywords}
Last post is NOT older than X days
Last post is older than X days
Use this ad type if you want to display link ads in sidebar as lists of links or inline anywhere else.
Use this package if you want to manage your own link ads or if you want to sell link ads.
Make your thread sticky for {costAmount} per {costPer}
Get more exposure for your thread by making it sticky.
Placeholders are special ads used for displaying an "advertise here" message on empty package positions, in order to attract advertisers.
Currently there are no packages available that can support placeholders.
The maximum number of words allowed in a keyword is {limit}
The maximum number of active ads this package can have.
Maximum days/weeks/months/years/views/clicks an advertiser can purchase. If the value is higher that the "Minimum purchase" option, the advertiser can choose how much to purchase.
The maximum number of results on page in forum view, thread view, conversation view, member view, tag view, search results, in order for the ad to display.
This option allows you to enable the promo code only for invoices with the amount equal or higher than x.
Minimum days/weeks/months/years/views/clicks an advertiser can purchase.
The minimum number of results on page in forum view, thread view, conversation view, member view, tag view, search results, in order for the ad to display.
The new owner is not a valid user.
No ads have been created yet.
No ads or packages have been selected.
We do not have active advertisers at the moment.
In order to allow advertisers to create featured resource ads, you have to select at least one category for "Allowed featured resource categories" option in Ads Manager [Advertiser] admin options.
We are sorry, currently there are no empty slots available.
In order to allow advertisers to create promo thread ads, you have to set the forum(s) from "Promo thread forums" option in Ads Manager [Advertiser] admin options.
In order to allow advertisers to create sticky thread ads, you have to select at least one forum for "Allowed sticky forums" option in Ads Manager [Advertiser] admin options.
No items have been found for statistics.
We are sorry, currently there are no advertising packages available.
No packages have been found for this ad type.
No packages have been created yet.
No payment method has been found.
No positions have been added to this category yet.
No positions have been added yet.
No resources have been found for you.
No threads have been found for you.

This option allows you to display the ad code without any div tags around the ad. Please note that this option doesn't work with lazy loading, AdBlock detection and most of the settings in the Settings tab.
Information that you may want to provide for this ad.
This option allows you to override the ad option "Inherit package setting" for all its ads. Please note that after saving the package, this option will remain unchecked.
Choose how to order the ads when displayed.
Provide information that you might want advertisers to know about this advertising option.
Display order for advertisers in package list.
This option allows you to export the package data as an XML file.
This option allows you to add content below the ad unit. You may use HTML.
This option allow you to display the ad only if the page number matches. Set to 0 to display on any page.
This option allow you to display the ad only if the page number does not match. Set to 0 to display on any page.
Set the name of the parameter that you want to replace in the affiliate URL and the value that you want to set for that parameter.
This option allows you to pause your ad if your website is down for maintenance or having technichal dificulties and don't want to send traffic during that time.
Payment has been marked as paid.
Please confirm that you want to deblock the following IP

Please confirm that you want to enable all the ads for this package.

Please enter a title that is at most {count} characters long.

Please enter a valid bank account number.

Please enter a valid popup content.
Please enter a valid popup title.
Please enter a valid SWIFT code.
Please select at least one ad to export.
Please select at least one package to export.
Please select at least one forum in Promo thread forums admin option.
Use this ad type if you want to display ads in a popup.
The content that will be displayed inside the popup.
Use this package if you want to manage your own popup ads or if you want to sell popup ads.
This option allows you to open an URL in a popup window.
Available in Bob's AMS article view
Available in thread view, conversation view and member view for dynamic positions within the results.
Available in Bob's Showcase item view
Position ID must be unique. The specified ID is already in use.
Please enter a valid position ID.

To use this position, copy the syntax below and paste it in the template or in the HTML widget where you want the ads to display.
<xf:macro template="siropu_ads_manager_ad_macros" name="ad_unit" arg-position="{positionId}" />
This action will delete all the current positions and categories and restore the defaults.
Post author is a member of any of the selected user groups
Post author is NOT a member of any of the selected user groups
Upload a screenshot of the place where the ads will be displayed on the page.

Promo code must be unique. Use only letters and numbers.

Use this ad type if you want to create a promo thread.
Use this package if you want to sell promo threads.
If more than one position is selected, this option allows you to display the ad randomly in one or more positions, based on the position limit set.

This method allows you to build the affiliate link by replacing the affiliate website with a custom affiliate URL.

To include the matched affiliate website in the URL, use the {match} placeholder.
To include only the URL components without the domain, use the {match_no_domain} placeholder.
To include only the URL path, use the {path} placeholder.
To include only the URL query, use the {query} placeholder.
This method allows you to replace one or more parameters in the affiliate URL.
Allows you to replace the keyword with something else.
The requested ad could not be found.
The requested invoice could not be found.

This tool allows you to give statistics access to advertisers that are not registered.
Send this link to your advertiser to grant statistics access for selected ads.
This title will be made public to the advertiser.
Use this ad type if you want to make a thread sticky.
If a value is set, this allows advertisers to sticky their threads in the selected forum.
Use this package if you want to sell sticky threads.
Sticky threads are displayed at the top of the thread list based on the last post date.

The address of the website you want to link to.

Here you can see which ads perform the best based on click-through rate.
Here you can see which packages perform the best based on click-through rate.
Here you can see which positions perform the best based on click-through rate. In order to see positions here, ads must have daily statistics enabled.
The maximum number of times the promo code can be used. Set to 0 for unlimited usage.

This option allows you set a custom width and height for the ad unit container.

This option allows you to style the ad unit container using CSS.

Example:

border: 1px solid gray; background: lightgray; padding: 10px;
Are you sure you want to unpause the ad?
This option allows you to use your own custom business invoice.
Do you want to generate the code using a callback?
Use callback to build affiliate URL

This method allows you to build the affiliate link using your own callback. The callback takes two arguments: $website, $url and must return your affiliate URL.

The $website argument is the affiliate website you set it above and $url is the URL for the affiliate website as it was found in the content.

Example callback:

\Path\To\MyCallbackClass::MyCallbackMethod
